name: part_007
file: tmp_【#常闇トワ4周年記念LIVE】Special Thank U!! J Medley 【3DLIVE】 [APbMhuPbwkE]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_007.mov

scenes.description: Instrumental interlude with visual kaleidoscope effects.
MC section where Towa talks to the audience about the medley performance.

subtitles.original: ダーリン いつか
subtitles.english: Darling, someday

subtitles.original: 忘れておくれ
subtitles.english: please forget me.

subtitles.original: 終わりがくるのを 待っているわ
subtitles.english: I'm waiting for the end to come.

subtitles.original: ダーリン 全部 あなたにあげる
subtitles.english: Darling, I'll give you everything.

subtitles.original: お気持ちはちゃんと 空けてちょうだい
subtitles.english: Please make sure your heart is empty.

subtitles.original: ダーリン いつか 認めておくれ
subtitles.english: Darling, someday please acknowledge me.

subtitles.original: その日がくるのを 待っているわ
subtitles.english: I'm waiting for that day to come.

subtitles.original: ダーリン
subtitles.english: Darling

subtitles.original: ダーリン
subtitles.english: Darling

subtitles.original: ダーリン
subtitles.english: Darling

subtitles.original: ダーリン
subtitles.english: Darling

subtitles.original: 行くぞー！
subtitles.english: Here we go!

subtitles.original: ラストチャンスに飢えたつま先が
subtitles.english: Toes hungry for a last chance

subtitles.original: 踊り出すまま 駆けたこの夜空
subtitles.english: ran through this night sky while dancing.

subtitles.original: 並みのスタンスじゃ靡かない
subtitles.english: Won't flutter with an average stance,

subtitles.original: 星は宝石の憧れ
subtitles.english: stars are jewels of longing.

subtitles.original: 浮かぶ涙と汗は血の代わり
subtitles.english: Floating tears and sweat instead of blood.

subtitles.original: 瞳の中でしか泳げない芝居
subtitles.english: A play that can only swim in the eyes,

subtitles.original: だけどステージが逃がさない
subtitles.english: but the stage won't let go.

subtitles.original: いついつまでも憧れ
subtitles.english: Longing forever and ever,

subtitles.original: 焦がれているよ
subtitles.english: I'm pining for it.

subtitles.original: I've never seen such a liar
subtitles.english: I've never seen such a liar.

subtitles.original: 生まれついたっての嘘つき
subtitles.english: Born to be such a liar.

subtitles.original: This is love. And this is a gift to the world.
subtitles.english: This is love. And this is a gift to the world.

subtitles.original: 誰を生きたか思い出して
subtitles.english: Remembering who I lived as,

subtitles.original: 私が命を賭けるから
subtitles.english: because I'm betting my life.

subtitles.original: あげるから
subtitles.english: I'll give it to you.

subtitles.original: あなたは時間をくれたのでしょう
subtitles.english: You probably gave me time,

subtitles.original: あらゆる望みの総てを
subtitles.english: all of every desire.

subtitles.original: 叶えたら 果たせたら
subtitles.english: If they come true, if they're fulfilled,

subtitles.original: あなたに会いたい 星に願いをかけて
subtitles.english: I want to see you, making a wish on a star.

subtitles.original: 戻れないから大切にするの
subtitles.english: Cherishing it because I can't go back.

subtitles.original: 始めないなら高を括れるよ
subtitles.english: I can underestimate it if I don't start.

subtitles.original: 報いの日（楽になる日）はまず来ない
subtitles.english: The day of reckoning won't come soon.

subtitles.original: 日々の中に集まる
subtitles.english: Gathering in the days,

subtitles.original: 悲しい光
subtitles.english: a sad light.

subtitles.original: 生まれついたっての嘘つき
subtitles.english: Born to be such a liar.

subtitles.original: This is love. And this is a gift to the world.
subtitles.english: This is love. And this is a gift to the world.

subtitles.original: 誰を生きたか
subtitles.english: Who did I live as?

subtitles.original: 忘れちゃった！
subtitles.english: I forgot!

subtitles.original: あなたに命が戻るなら
subtitles.english: If life returns to you,

subtitles.original: 届くなら
subtitles.english: if it reaches you.

subtitles.original: 私はどうなろうと構わないのに
subtitles.english: Even though I don't care what happens to me.

subtitles.original: どうやら総ては叶わない
subtitles.english: It seems all will not come true.

subtitles.original: 叶わないならば
subtitles.english: If they don't come true,

subtitles.original: あなたになりたい 星は砕け光る
subtitles.english: I want to become you; stars shatter and shine.

subtitles.original: 私が命を賭けるから
subtitles.english: Because I'm betting my life,

subtitles.original: あげるから
subtitles.english: I'll give it to you.

subtitles.original: あなたは時間をくれたのでしょう
subtitles.english: You gave me time, didn't you?

subtitles.original: あらゆる望みの総てを
subtitles.english: All of every desire.

subtitles.original: 叶えたら 果たせたら
subtitles.english: If they come true, if they're fulfilled,

subtitles.original: あなたに会いたい 星に願いをかけて
subtitles.english: I want to see you, making a wish on a star.

subtitles.original: さあ星の子たちよ よくお眠りなさい
subtitles.english: Now, children of the stars, sleep well.

subtitles.original: 輝きは鈍らない あなたたちならば
subtitles.english: The radiance will not fade, if it's you.

subtitles.original: さあ星の子たちよ よく狙いなさい
subtitles.english: Now, children of the stars, aim well.

subtitles.original: 瞬きを許さない あなたたちならば
subtitles.english: I won't allow a blink, if it's you.

subtitles.original: 歌ってきましたが、いかがだったでしょうか？
subtitles.english: I've been singing, how was it?

subtitles.original: イェーイ！ノンストップメドレー！
subtitles.english: Yay! Non-stop medley!

subtitles.original: 生誕祭とかね、周年記念はね
subtitles.english: For birthday celebrations and anniversary commemorations...

subtitles.original: 今までね結構ホロライブメンバーの楽曲を歌わせてもらったりとか
subtitles.english: I've been singing a lot of songs by Hololive members until now...

subtitles.original: ホロライブが作ってるオリジナルね
subtitles.english: Or original songs made by Hololive.
